word:
Let the work in Washington move forward. Let every one act his part in self-denial and self-sacrifice. Our people are not to wait for more appeals, but are to lay right hold of the work, making those things which appear impossibilities, possibilities. Let each one ask himself, Has not the Lord entrusted me with means for the advancement of His cause? Has he not bidden his servants in Washington 


         Arise and Build? 

Shall I, at this time of great importance, withhold my means, which God asks me to invest in raising up memorials for Him?
